campaign.accessible_bidding_strategy.description: The accessible bidding strategy of the campaign.

campaign.ad_serving_optimization_status.description: The optimization status for serving ads within the campaign.

campaign.advertising_channel_sub_type.description: The sub-type of advertising channel for the campaign.

campaign.advertising_channel_type.description: The type of advertising channel for the campaign.

campaign.app_campaign_setting.app_id.description: The ID of the app associated with the app campaign setting.

campaign.app_campaign_setting.app_store.description: The app store for the mobile app associated with the app campaign setting.

campaign.app_campaign_setting.bidding_st.description: The goal type for the app campaign's bidding strategy.

campaign.asset_automation_settings.description: Contains the opt-in/out status for each AssetAutomationType.

campaign.audience_setting.use_audience_g.description: If true, uses an Audience resource for targeting; if false, uses audience segment criteria.

campaign.base_campaign.description: The base campaign linked to the current campaign.

campaign.bidding_strategy.description: The bidding strategy used for the campaign.

campaign.bidding_strategy_system_status.description: The system status of the campaign's bidding strategy.

campaign.bidding_strategy_type.description: The type of bidding strategy employed for the campaign.

campaign.campaign_budget.description: The budget allocated for the campaign.

campaign.campaign_group.description: The resource name of the campaign group this campaign belongs to.

campaign_budget.amount_micros.description: The budget amount in micros allocated for the campaign.

campaign.commission.commission_rate_micr.description: The commission rate in micros for the campaign.

campaign.demand_gen_campaign_settings.up.description: Specifies whether this Demand Gen campaign uses upgraded targeting options.

campaign.dynamic_search_ads_setting.doma.description: The domain name set for dynamic search ads within the campaign.

campaign.dynamic_search_ads_setting.feed.description: List of feeds utilized for dynamic search ads.

campaign.dynamic_search_ads_setting.lang.description: The language code associated with dynamic search ads.

campaign.dynamic_search_ads_setting.use_.description: Flag indicating whether only supplied URLs are used for dynamic search ads.

campaign.end_date.description: The end date of the campaign.

campaign.excluded_parent_asset_field_typ.description: Types of parent asset fields excluded from the campaign.

campaign.excluded_parent_asset_set_types.description: The asset set types that should be excluded from this campaign.

campaign.experiment_type.description: The type of experiment conducted for the campaign.

campaign.final_url_suffix.description: The final URL suffix used for tracking in the campaign.

campaign.fixed_cpm.goal.description: The bidding goal for fixed CPM campaigns.

campaign.fixed_cpm.target_frequency_info.description: The target frequency count for fixed CPM bidding.
The time unit for target frequency in fixed CPM bidding.

campaign.frequency_caps.description: Caps on ad serving frequency for the campaign.

campaign.geo_target_type_setting.negativ.description: The negative geo target type settings for the campaign.

campaign.geo_target_type_setting.positiv.description: The positive geo target type settings for the campaign.

campaign.hotel_property_asset_set.description: The set of hotel properties for Performance Max for travel goals campaigns.

campaign.hotel_setting.hotel_center_id.description: The hotel center ID associated with hotel campaigns.

campaign.id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

campaign.keyword_match_type.description: Keyword match type for the campaign (e.g. BROAD).

campaign.listing_type.description: Listing type of ads served for this campaign (used for Performance Max).

campaign.local_campaign_setting.location.description: The source type for location targeting in local campaigns.

campaign.local_services_campaign_setting.description: Categorical level bids for MANUAL_CPA strategy in Local Services campaigns.

campaign.manual_cpa.description: Manual CPA bidding strategy (Local Services only).

campaign.manual_cpc.enhanced_cpc_enabled.description: Indication of whether Enhanced CPC is enabled for manual CPC campaigns.

campaign.manual_cpm.description: Manual CPM bidding used in the campaign.

campaign.manual_cpv.description: Manual CPV bidding used in the campaign.

campaign.maximize_conversion_value.targe.description: Target ROAS set for maximizing conversion value in the campaign.

campaign.maximize_conversions.target_cpa.description: Target CPA in micros set for maximizing conversions in the campaign.

campaign.network_settings.target_content.description: Indication of targeting the content network in network settings.

campaign.network_settings.target_google_.description: Indication of targeting Google Search in network settings.
Indication of targeting the Google TV network in network settings.

campaign.network_settings.target_partner.description: Indication of targeting partner search network in network settings.

campaign.network_settings.target_search_.description: Indication of targeting search network in network settings.

campaign.network_settings.target_youtube.description: Indication of targeting YouTube in network settings.

campaign.optimization_goal_setting.optim.description: Types of optimization goals set for the campaign.

campaign.optimization_score.description: The optimization score of the campaign.

campaign.payment_mode.description: The payment mode chosen for the campaign.

campaign.percent_cpc.cpc_bid_ceiling_mic.description: The CPC bid ceiling in micros for percent CPC bidding.

campaign.percent_cpc.enhanced_cpc_enable.description: Indication of Enhanced CPC enabled for percent CPC bidding.

campaign.performance_max_upgrade.perform.description: Performance Max campaign that this campaign is upgraded to.

campaign.performance_max_upgrade.pre_upg.description: Legacy campaign upgraded to Performance Max.

campaign.performance_max_upgrade.status.description: The upgrade status of a campaign requested to be upgraded to Performance Max.

campaign.primary_status.description: Primary status of the campaign, indicating serving or other constraints.

campaign.primary_status_reasons.description: Reasons underlying the primary status of the campaign.

campaign.real_time_bidding_setting.opt_i.description: Opt-in status for real-time bidding within the campaign.

campaign.resource_name.description: The resource name of the campaign.

campaign.selective_optimization.conversi.description: Conversion actions selected for selective optimization within the campaign.

campaign.serving_status.description: The serving status of the campaign.

campaign.shopping_setting.advertising_pa.description: Ads account IDs of advertising partners in the campaign.

campaign.shopping_setting.campaign_prior.description: Campaign priority set for shopping campaigns.

campaign.shopping_setting.disable_produc.description: Disable the optional product feed (only for Demand Gen campaigns).

campaign.shopping_setting.enable_local.description: Flag indicating whether local shopping is enabled for the campaign.

campaign.shopping_setting.feed_label.description: Feed label for included products. Can be a country code (e.g., 'US') or any valid label.

campaign.shopping_setting.merchant_id.description: The merchant ID associated with shopping campaigns.

campaign.shopping_setting.use_vehicle_in.description: Whether to target vehicle listing inventory (for certain Smart Shopping campaigns).

campaign.start_date.description: The start date of the campaign.

campaign.target_cpa.cpc_bid_ceiling_micr.description: The CPC bid ceiling in micros for target CPA bidding.

campaign.target_cpa.cpc_bid_floor_micros.description: The CPC bid floor in micros for target CPA bidding.

campaign.target_cpa.target_cpa_micros.description: The target CPA in micros for target CPA bidding.

campaign.target_cpm.target_frequency_goa.description: The target count set for target frequency goal in target CPM bidding.
The time unit set for target frequency goal in target CPM bidding.

campaign.target_impression_share.cpc_bid.description: The CPC bid ceiling in micros for target impression share bidding.

campaign.target_impression_share.locatio.description: The location targeted for target impression share bidding.
The location fraction in micros for target impression share bidding.

campaign.target_roas.cpc_bid_ceiling_mic.description: The CPC bid ceiling in micros for target ROAS bidding.

campaign.target_roas.cpc_bid_floor_micro.description: The CPC bid floor in micros for target ROAS bidding.

campaign.target_roas.target_roas.description: The target ROAS set for target ROAS bidding.

campaign.target_spend.cpc_bid_ceiling_mi.description: The CPC bid ceiling in micros for target spend bidding.

campaign.target_spend.target_spend_micro.description: The target spend in micros for target spend bidding (deprecated).

campaign.targeting_setting.target_restri.description: Restrictions applied to targeting within the campaign.

campaign.tracking_setting.tracking_url.description: The tracking URL set for campaign tracking.

campaign.tracking_url_template.description: The template for tracking URLs in the campaign.

campaign.travel_campaign_settings.travel.description: The Travel account ID associated with the Travel campaign.

campaign.url_custom_parameters.description: Custom parameters added to campaign URLs.

campaign.url_expansion_opt_out.description: Flag for opting out of URL expansion in Performance Max campaigns.

campaign.vanity_pharma.vanity_pharma_dis.description: The display URL mode set for vanity pharma in the campaign.

campaign.vanity_pharma.vanity_pharma_tex.description: The text used for vanity pharma in the campaign.

campaign.video_brand_safety_suitability.description: The brand safety suitability settings for video ads within the campaign.

campaign.video_campaign_settings.video_a.description: Whether VideoResponsiveAds can be used for in-feed video ads.
Whether VideoResponsiveAds can be used for in-stream video ads.
Whether VideoResponsiveAds can be used as shorts format.

metrics.active_view_cpm.description: Active View CPM metric for the campaign.

metrics.active_view_ctr.description: Active View CTR metric for the campaign.

metrics.active_view_impressions.description: Number of active view impressions for the campaign.

metrics.active_view_measurability.description: Active view measurability metric for the campaign.

metrics.active_view_measurable_cost_micr.description: Cost in micros for measurable active view impressions.

metrics.active_view_measurable_impressio.description: Number of measurable active view impressions.

metrics.active_view_viewability.description: Active view viewability metric for the campaign.

metrics.all_conversions.description: Total number of conversions, including those not counted in the 'conversions' metric.

metrics.all_conversions_by_conversion_da.description: All conversions attributed to the date of conversion.

metrics.all_conversions_from_click_to_ca.description: Number of call button clicks after clicking an ad.

metrics.all_conversions_from_directions.description: Number of directions clicks after clicking an ad.

metrics.all_conversions_from_interaction.description: All conversions from interactions / total ad interactions.
Value of all conversions / total number of interactions.

metrics.all_conversions_from_location_as.description: Number of call button clicks from location asset after an interaction.
Number of directions clicks from location asset after an interaction.
Number of menu link clicks from location asset after an interaction.
Number of order clicks from location asset after an interaction.
Number of other local action clicks from location asset after an interaction.
Estimated store visits from location asset after an interaction.
Number of website URL clicks from location asset after an interaction.

metrics.all_conversions_from_menu.description: Number of menu link clicks after clicking an ad (feed items).

metrics.all_conversions_from_order.description: Number of orders placed after clicking an ad (feed items).

metrics.all_conversions_from_other_engag.description: Number of other conversions (e.g., reviews) after clicking an ad (feed items).

metrics.all_conversions_from_store_visit.description: Estimated store visits after clicking an ad (feed items).

metrics.all_conversions_from_store_websi.description: Number of times users visited the store's website after clicking an ad (feed items).

metrics.all_conversions_value.description: The total value of all conversions.

metrics.all_conversions_value_by_convers.description: Total value of all conversions by the date of conversion.

metrics.all_conversions_value_per_cost.description: Value of all conversions / total cost.

metrics.all_new_customer_lifetime_value.description: All of new customers' lifetime conversion value (if using customer acquisition goals).

metrics.average_cart_size.description: Average number of products purchased per order (cart data).

metrics.average_cpc.description: Average cost per click (total cost / clicks).

metrics.average_cpe.description: Average cost per engagement (total cost / engagements).

metrics.average_cpv.description: Average cost per view (total cost / video views).

metrics.average_impression_frequency_per.description: Average number of times a unique user saw your ad within a limited date range.

metrics.average_order_value_micros.description: Average order value (in micros), from cart data.

metrics.average_page_views.description: Average number of pages viewed per session (Google Analytics).

metrics.average_target_cpa_micros.description: Average Target CPA in micros (or unset).

metrics.average_time_on_site.description: Average duration (in seconds) of site visits (Google Analytics).

metrics.benchmark_average_max_cpc.description: Competitive benchmark for average max CPC on similar products.

metrics.clicks.description: Total number of clicks in the campaign.

metrics.content_budget_lost_impression_s.description: Estimated % of times your ads didn't show on Display due to low budget.

metrics.content_impression_share.description: Impressions on the Display Network / eligible impressions.

metrics.content_rank_lost_impression_sha.description: Estimated % of times your ads didn't show on Display due to Ad Rank.

metrics.conversions.description: Total number of conversions (includes only actions set to count in 'conversions').

metrics.conversions_by_conversion_date.description: Conversions attributed to their actual conversion date.

metrics.conversions_value_by_conversion_.description: Value of conversions attributed to the date of conversion.

metrics.cost_micros.description: Total cost in micros incurred for the campaign.

metrics.cost_of_goods_sold_micros.description: Cost of goods sold for orders attributed to your ads (in micros).

metrics.cross_device_conversions.description: Conversions from one device to another.

metrics.cross_device_conversions_value_m.description: Sum of cross-device conversions' values in micros.

metrics.cross_sell_cost_of_goods_sold_mi.description: Cost of goods sold for cross-sold products (in micros).

metrics.cross_sell_gross_profit_micros.description: Gross profit from cross-sold products (in micros).

metrics.cross_sell_units_sold.description: Number of cross-sold products sold in total.

metrics.current_model_attributed_convers.description: Conversions as measured by the currently selected attribution model.
Value of current model conversions / total interactions.
Value of current model attributed conversions.

metrics.eligible_impressions_from_locati.description: Number of impressions where a location was shown or used for targeting.

metrics.engagement_rate.description: Engagements / impressions for certain ad formats (e.g., Lightbox).

metrics.engagements.description: Number of engagements (expansions of Lightbox ads, etc.).

metrics.gmail_forwards.description: Number of times a Gmail ad was forwarded.

metrics.gmail_saves.description: Number of times a Gmail ad was saved.

metrics.gmail_secondary_clicks.description: Number of clicks to the landing page on the expanded Gmail ad.

metrics.gross_profit_margin.description: Percentage gross profit margin from orders (after COGS).

metrics.gross_profit_micros.description: Gross profit from orders (revenue minus COGS), in micros.

metrics.historical_creative_quality_scor.description: The historical creative quality score (enum bucket).

metrics.historical_landing_page_quality_.description: The historical landing page quality score (enum bucket).

metrics.historical_search_predicted_ctr.description: The historical search predicted CTR (enum bucket).

metrics.hotel_average_lead_value_micros.description: Average lead value for Hotel Ads in micros.

metrics.hotel_eligible_impressions.description: Number of impressions for which Hotel Ads were eligible.

metrics.hotel_price_difference_percentag.description: Average price difference between your price and the cheapest competitor.

metrics.impressions.description: Total number of impressions for the campaign.

metrics.interaction_event_types.description: Types of payable/free interactions in the campaign metrics.

metrics.interactions.description: Total number of interactions in the campaign.

metrics.lead_cost_of_goods_sold_micros.description: COGS for items that match the advertised product, in micros.

metrics.lead_gross_profit_micros.description: Gross profit for items that match the advertised product, in micros.

metrics.lead_revenue_micros.description: Revenue from items that match the advertised product, in micros.

metrics.lead_units_sold.description: Number of units sold that match the advertised product.

metrics.message_chat_rate.description: message_chats / message_impressions for Click To Message ads.

metrics.message_impressions.description: Number of Click To Message impressions that were eligible for tracking.

metrics.mobile_friendly_clicks_percentag.description: Percentage of mobile clicks going to a valid AMP page.

metrics.new_customer_lifetime_value.description: New customers' lifetime conversion value (if using acquisition goals).

metrics.optimization_score_uplift.description: Total optimization score uplift of all recommendations.

metrics.optimization_score_url.description: URL for the optimization score page in Google Ads UI.

metrics.orders.description: Number of purchase conversions (from cart data).

metrics.publisher_purchased_clicks.description: Clicks from paid or incentivized traffic sources.

metrics.publisher_unknown_clicks.description: Clicks from unknown sources of traffic.

metrics.relative_ctr.description: CTR relative to other advertisers on the same Display Network sites.

metrics.revenue_micros.description: Total revenue from orders attributed to ads (in micros).

metrics.search_absolute_top_impression_s.description: Percent of ad impressions shown in the most prominent position in search.

metrics.search_budget_lost_absolute_top_.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't appear in the top position due to low budget.

metrics.search_budget_lost_impression_sh.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't show on search due to low budget.

metrics.search_budget_lost_top_impressio.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't show above organic results due to low budget.

metrics.search_click_share.description: Clicks received on Search / total eligible clicks.

metrics.search_exact_match_impression_sh.description: Impressions for exact match keywords / total eligible exact match impressions.

metrics.search_impression_share.description: Impressions on search / total eligible impressions.

metrics.search_rank_lost_absolute_top_im.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't appear in top position due to Ad Rank.

metrics.search_rank_lost_impression_shar.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't show on search due to Ad Rank.

metrics.search_rank_lost_top_impression_.description: Estimated % of times ads didn't show above organic results due to Ad Rank.

metrics.search_top_impression_share.description: Impressions above organic results / total eligible top impressions.

metrics.sk_ad_network_installs.description: Number of iOS Store Kit Ad Network installs.

metrics.sk_ad_network_total_conversions.description: Total iOS Store Kit Ad Network conversions.

metrics.top_impression_percentage.description: Percent of ad impressions shown above the organic results.

metrics.unique_users.description: Number of unique users who saw your ad (92-day limit).

metrics.units_sold.description: Total products sold from all orders attributed to ads.

metrics.valid_accelerated_mobile_pages_c.description: Percentage of clicks to AMP landing pages that reach valid AMP.

metrics.value_per_all_conversions_by_con.description: All conversions value / all conversions, by conversion date.

metrics.value_per_conversions_by_convers.description: Conversions value / conversions, attributed to the date of conversion.

metrics.value_per_current_model_attribut.description: Current model conversions value / number of those conversions.

metrics.video_quartile_p100_rate.description: Rate of viewers who watched 100% of the video.

metrics.video_quartile_p25_rate.description: Rate of viewers who watched 25% of the video.

metrics.video_quartile_p50_rate.description: Rate of viewers who watched 50% of the video.

metrics.video_quartile_p75_rate.description: Rate of viewers who watched 75% of the video.

metrics.video_views.description: Total number of video views in the campaign.

metrics.view_through_conversions_from_lo.description: Number of call button clicks from location asset after an impression.

segments.ad_network_type.description: The type of ad network used for segmentation.

segments.date.description: Date segment used for campaign data.

segments.hour.description: Hour segment used for campaign data (0-23).

segments.activity_account_id.description: Activity account ID for travel activity.

segments.activity_city.description: City where the travel activity is available.

segments.activity_country.description: Country where the travel activity is available.

segments.activity_state.description: State where the travel activity is available.

segments.ad_destination_type.description: Ad destination type (e.g. WEBSITE, APP_DEEP_LINK, etc).

segments.asset_interaction_target.intera.description: True if interactions occurred on this asset specifically.

segments.budget_campaign_association_sta.description: Resource name of the campaign in a budget association.

segments.click_type.description: Type of click (e.g. HEADLINE, SITELINK, etc).

segments.conversion_action.description: Resource name of the conversion action.

segments.conversion_adjustment.description: True if the row represents an adjustment to a prior conversion.

segments.conversion_attribution_event_ty.description: Attribution event type for the conversion.

segments.conversion_lag_bucket.description: Days between the impression and the conversion (bucket).

segments.conversion_or_adjustment_lag_bu.description: Days between the impression and conversion/adjustment (bucket).

segments.conversion_value_rule_primary_d.description: Primary dimension of the applied conversion value rule.

segments.external_conversion_source.description: Source of the external conversion (e.g. ANALYTICS).

segments.geo_target_airport.description: Geo target constant for an airport.

segments.geo_target_canton.description: Geo target constant for a canton.

segments.geo_target_city.description: Geo target constant for a city.

segments.geo_target_country.description: Geo target constant for a country.

segments.geo_target_county.description: Geo target constant for a county.

segments.geo_target_district.description: Geo target constant for a district.

segments.geo_target_metro.description: Geo target constant for a metro area.

segments.geo_target_most_specific_locati.description: Geo target constant for the most specific location.

segments.geo_target_postal_code.description: Geo target constant for a postal code.

segments.geo_target_province.description: Geo target constant for a province.

segments.geo_target_region.description: Geo target constant for a region.

segments.geo_target_state.description: Geo target constant for a state.

segments.hotel_center_id.description: Segment for the hotel center ID.

segments.hotel_check_in_day_of_week.description: Day of week for the hotel check-in.

segments.hotel_date_selection_type.description: Type of the hotel date selection.

segments.hotel_length_of_stay.description: Length of stay for a hotel booking.

segments.hotel_rate_type.description: Hotel rate type (e.g., per night, per stay).

segments.interaction_on_this_extension.description: True if the interaction occurred on this extension itself.

segments.month.description: Month (yyyy-MM-dd) for the first day of a month.

segments.new_versus_returning_customers.description: Segments conversions by new vs returning customers.

segments.placeholder_type.description: Placeholder type for feed item metrics.

segments.product_channel.description: Channel of the product (e.g. ONLINE, LOCAL).

segments.product_channel_exclusivity.description: Channel exclusivity of the product (e.g. SINGLE_CHANNEL, MULTI_CHANNEL).

segments.product_condition.description: Condition of the product (NEW, USED, etc).

segments.product_country.description: Geo target constant for the country of sale of the product.

segments.product_language.description: Resource name of the language constant for the product's language.

segments.quarter.description: Quarter start date (yyyy-MM-dd), e.g. 2018-04-01 for Q2 2018.

segments.search_engine_results_page_type.description: Type of the search engine results page.

segments.sk_ad_network_ad_event_type.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network ad event type.

segments.sk_ad_network_attribution_credi.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network attribution credit type.

segments.sk_ad_network_coarse_conversion.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network coarse conversion value.

segments.sk_ad_network_fine_conversion_v.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network fine conversion value (int64).

segments.sk_ad_network_postback_sequence.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network postback sequence index.

segments.sk_ad_network_redistributed_fin.description: Sum of modeled and observed SKAN fine conversion values.

segments.sk_ad_network_source_app.sk_ad_.description: App ID where the SKAN-driving ad was shown.

segments.sk_ad_network_source_domain.description: Website domain of the SKAN-driving ad.

segments.sk_ad_network_source_type.description: Source type of the SKAN-driving ad.

segments.sk_ad_network_user_type.description: iOS Store Kit Ad Network user type.

segments.sk_ad_network_version.description: Version of the SKAdNetwork API used.

segments.slot.description: Position of the ad (e.g., SEARCH, CONTENT).

segments.week.description: Week start date (yyyy-MM-dd) for Monday of that week.
